title: Merkel's coalition deal draws fire from own party
text:
Merkel's coalition deal draws fire from own party Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 02:12 
German Chancellor Angela Merkel has sealed a coalition deal after months of wrangling. But the concessions she made have provoked sniping from within her own party. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
German Chancellor Angela Merkel has sealed a coalition deal after months of wrangling. But the concessions she made have provoked sniping from within her own party. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2EwwtdG
